attributes.action: Make available a Grant to purchase Double Glazing enabling those house holders who do not have cavity walls to improve the  energy efficientcy of their homes and cut energy bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a large number of houses in the Uk that cannot improve their energy efficiency with a Cavity Wall Insulation Grant. A very large number of houses that were built in Victorian times and earlier do not have cavity walls and are built of solid construction. Also a large number of these houses have had loft conversions and can not benefit from the loft insulating grant that is available.  Please can the Government consider a Grant for Double Glazing installation in these houses to help householders decrease their carbon footprint and their energy bills.
